definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: It will allow computing to expand in all directions and serve ever more users.
sentences.chinese: 計算向各方向擴展，服務於更多用戶。

sentences.english: The performance of these different multiuser diversity schemes is not the same.
sentences.chinese: 然而不同多用戶分集方案的系統性能不盡相同。

sentences.english: A multiuser detection method based on adaptive wavelet network is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於自適應子波網絡的多用戶檢測方法。

sentences.english: The Professional version is available as a multi-user networked version.
sentences.chinese: 專業版可以作爲一個多用戶網絡版本。

sentences.english: Strict security measure , multi-levels user administration, customized purview.
sentences.chinese: 嚴密的安全措施，多級多用戶管理，權限自定義。

sentences.english: The design of multi-user Watt-hour meter based on the DSP technology is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種採用DSP處理器的多用戶電能表設計。

sentences.english: When complete, the operating system will be in multi-user mode.
sentences.chinese: 啓動完成時，操作系統將處於多用戶模式。

sentences.english: It is multiuser providing product entry forms, reports and charts.
sentences.chinese: 這是多用戶提供產品的報名表格，報告和圖表。

sentences.english: In this paper, present multiuser detection algorithms used for CDMA system are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 文中總述了上述的多用戶檢測算法。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT Multiuser detection is one of the key techniques for future CDMA system.
sentences.chinese: 多用戶檢測技術是未來CDMA系統的一個關鍵技術。

sentences.english: It is a simple, multi-user game.
sentences.chinese: 那是一個簡單的，多用戶的遊戲。

sentences.english: The application method of multi-ports card to the computer distributed monitor-controlling system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了多用戶卡在微機分佈式監控系統中的應用方法。

sentences.english: Support for multiple users to connect and re-connect.
sentences.chinese: 可以支持多用戶連接以及重連接。

sentences.english: Multiuser detection is a effective measures to erase these problems.
sentences.chinese: 多用戶檢測是消除這些問題的有效措施。

sentences.english: This paper describes a multi-user on-line retrieval system, which was developed and used to process library document information in people's university.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了一個圖書文獻情報多用戶聯機檢索系統。

sentences.english: In this paper, we do far-ranging research on blind multiuser detection algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 本文對盲多用戶檢測算法進行了廣泛深入的研究。
